snippet: Facebook, in a motion that seeks to consolidate several shareholder lawsuits, provided the first glimpse of the social network's defense of its bungled I.P.O. It is a defense built, in part, on Nasdaq's missteps.
abstract: Facebook, in a motion that seeks to consolidate several shareholder lawsuits, provided the first glimpse of the social network's defense of its bungled I.P.O. It is a defense built, in part, on Nasdaq's missteps.

headline.main: In Motion, Facebook Lays Out Defense and Highlights Nasdaq's Missteps
headline.print_headline: Facebook Asks Court To Consolidate I.P.O. Lawsuits
